website_summaries.verdict: If you are a hobbyist with minor cutting tasks, it will work for you. But if you are looking for a solid design with a value price, choose the Bosch instead.
pros: Lightweight and has folding legs that make it easy to move and store
It's pre-assembled, which saves a lot of time and hassle
It's also the least expensive we considered
cons: It doesn't accommodate all routers, and some owners found the plastic side supports to be flimsy
Also less durable than more costly models

customer_reviews.title: I have some serious Reservations
customer_reviews.text: This table's plastic end-supports are a little difficult. bit funky and unstable. The end-pockets store well but access to items is somewhat Router Table attachment plate is short of holes to adapt to some popular routers. Verify that your router (specif model SN) is included min their list.I would buy a table made by the same supplier as your router to insureit works. I had to buy a universal adapter plate at $50.00 more.
customer_reviews.author: Stumpy

customer_reviews.title: Good hobby router table.
customer_reviews.text: You can probably make you own by cutting a hole in a board and clamp a fence. Or get this with pre-fabricated board and split fence, with relevant accessories. Compared to the 800, this is a better option with seemingly larger insert rings, sliding T-tracks, larger table, specialized router mounting plate with quick release, and semi-functional storage bins. I would have preferred two bags instead. I don't use it often. It's a good hobbyist unit. Compared to the Bosch table, this fence face is melamine laminated, and I didn't want to risk a warp in the aluminium. It's also collapsible and ties into my other Skil machines. Sturdier if you screw it down to something.
customer_reviews.author: Roger C.

customer_reviews.title: Good router table, but kinda weird legs and storage compartments
customer_reviews.text: Good compact router table. Fits my Ryobi router like a glove. Comes with some ok tools like a push stick, depth gauge, and fence. Those are plastic construction without too much fanfare, but they do the job pretty well. Table itself is kinda weird; it's portable, which is awesome, but the legs are odd. Not bad, but odd. The storage bays are the only thing I don't like; they aren't even big enough to hold the accessories the unit comes with, let alone router bit cases. The unit comes with 2 router plates and a vacuum dust port. I use the small plate almost exclusively, and it was super easy to hook up to my dust collection system.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy F Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Not all Skil routers will fit this table
customer_reviews.text: I love the table but was disappointed that my Skil brand router would not fit. According to the instructions there are only 4 Skil routers that will fit on this table. I considered drilling my own holes in the mounting plate, but the base on my Skil 1827 router was just too big. I ended up buying a Dewalt (DW616) router to keep mounted to the table, and that works great, but it was money that I didn't really want to spend. Another review mentioned safety concerns of the quick release mounting bracket. Because of that review I do double check the mount to make sure it is secure, but I personally have not had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tim O

customer_reviews.title: Nice table for Dewalt routers
customer_reviews.text: This router table works great with a Dewalt router. The table has all the features I wanted is easy to adjust. I was able to modify the fence to work with my shop vac to cut down on dust. The one foot power cord is ridiculous, but it's easy to add an extension. It's too bad the cord on the Dewalt is so long too. Took a bit of work to get it out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: G. Clarkson

customer_reviews.title: If you purchase, use it before the return window is up should you run into the defects I did
customer_reviews.text: Finally used it today. But missed the return window. Not very stable. The left fence laminate covering started coming off/ splitting on lower causing it to longer be square or flush on the second 8ft routing, the laminate on the table where you feed the beginning also has worn off after the second 8ft piece as well.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected at this price range
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected at this price range. I had to raise the insert ring about .040" to get it flush with the table top, and the fence halves were out of line by about .015". I removed the MDF fence plates and cleaned up the plastic fence base face with a large sanding block and 60 grit paper. It's perfect now. The quick release router mount is awesome and makes changing bits a snap. After making my adjustments I've been able to produce beautiful work on this little table.
customer_reviews.author: tina pelosi

customer_reviews.title: Good router table for the money. Read the manual. Make sure to verify your router is compatible before buying.
customer_reviews.text: RTM. This is a really cool little table. (router not included) I already had a router. You need to make sure your router is one of the ones supported by the table before purchasing. It only supports certain brands and models. It has a lot of features and is as advertised. Quite sturdy. It is a tabletop model. You need to have a platform to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Ease of changing out router bits on this table makes it a winner!
customer_reviews.text: For the money you can't go wrong, better than other comparable tables in this price range that is for sure. I like the fact that the router mounts to a plate that makes in and out of the table to change bits a breeze. The legs, folding up, storage is a little less desirable.
customer_reviews.author: Woodmeister

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: So excited to receive the package. Check the parts against the manual only to find out the manual is written without looking at the product. They simply don’t match. So I tried to put the pieces together. Finally the table is taking shape, except that the 10-24 carriage screw to hold the mitre guide is not in the package. How to contact the seller for that?
customer_reviews.author: C. N.

customer_reviews.title: Caution on compatibility
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table a few years back and have been satisfied for the limited woodwork I do. Router quit on me and bought new Ryobi but table is not compatible with the quick mount plate.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Narendorf

customer_reviews.title: Great table but
customer_reviews.text: This works great once I called customer service to figure out how to attach my router It is a skill router but has to be turned so that it works. Once that was figured out it is fine. Skil's rep was very helpful
customer_reviews.author: john o

customer_reviews.title: I’m sending it back. The table fence has a ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m sending it back. The table fence has a chip in the Formica. The cover for the accessory holder is bent. The latch locking mechanism on the bottom that hold the router in place is bent. Not sure if this was repackaged but it has dings!
customer_reviews.author: Alfalfa

customer_reviews.title: Good little table
customer_reviews.text: Good little table. One of the lids on one of the toolboxes on the leg qas warped. It was a pleasurable and easy process to replace it through Skil customer service. They sent me an entire tool box in less than a week from initial complaint. Great conpany and solid product. I have made several pieces of decortive trim and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Seth & Lisy

customer_reviews.title: I really like and would have given 5 stars but a friend ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like and would have given 5 stars but a friend who has a different one pointed out the measurements are a decal and his wore off quickly after just one use. I sprayed a clear coat and will see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Stc2581

customer_reviews.title: So far it's okay.
customer_reviews.text: I took the table out of the box and located the directions to assemble everything. I then took the directions and read through it before I began to assemble it. The directions are not as helpful as they could be. Attaching the rear guide to the table is confusing. There are YouTube videos so check them out. It will make the assembly process much easier! I will update this after I use it for a while. I am a little worried about the strength of the router mounting plate. After I use it I will be able to post a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Troy A Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make storm windows for my house. Very easy to use, well made and overall a great product for a amateur.
customer_reviews.author: semperfi363

customer_reviews.title: The table seems to pretty functional with a bit of a learning curve
customer_reviews.text: New to router tables. I have the skil 1830 and was able to set it up. I know that a few people have complained that it won't line up, but it does. The table seems to pretty functional with a bit of a learning curve. Overall I'm happy with the table.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Solid engineering and responsive U.S. based Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely engineered product with some room for improvement; specifically stability and squaring the fence. I would rate it 4 stars, however, because I think Customer Support adds value to a product, I have rated it 5 stars. The cam that the latch lever pivots on to lock the router/mounting plate to the base plate/table had bent after first use...not sure from a manufacturing or user error. Either way, I called Skil Customer Support (based in the U.S.) and they promptly sent a new base plate assembly. With its solid engineering and responsive U.S. based Customer Support, I recommend products from this manufacturer. I have already purchased another Skil power tool.
customer_reviews.author: Breandan

customer_reviews.title: Woodworking made easier
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with shipping time, it's exactly as shown online and i love using it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Router Bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this router bench. It fit my Dewalt Router ( DW616 ) PERFECTLY.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: RAS 900 router table arrived on time well packaged. I mounted Skil 1830 router under it. I am new at woodworking and this table is great for the price. As I learn more I find some small faults one of them being adjusting the height of the bit while in the table is a little frustrating. Overall I have enjoyed using it so far and I am learning to overcome the drawbacks I have found and it is serving me well. I would recommend this to a beginning woodworker.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Great price. My husband was very pleased with this ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price. My husband was very pleased with this table. And it was cheaper than buying it at a store. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Tanna S

customer_reviews.title: Materials
customer_reviews.text: It’s not compatible for my makita cordless router it’s a bit disappointed. I am looking for a way to make it work hopefully!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad design. Fences and feathers are not that great
customer_reviews.text: Bad design. Fences and feathers are not that great. Bggest issue is the power box is sited in such a way that the receptacles face in...so one has to blindly plug in the router. Worst is that the Skil router I purchased does not mate that well with this tabe. Save your money and spend a bit more and get a better router table - maybe a Kreg.
customer_reviews.author: Transplant

customer_reviews.title: My first router table
customer_reviews.text: Router table seems to be working fine for small projects. I like the compact design for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Honukane

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you order table router and not plunge router..lol
customer_reviews.text: Table was great, my choice of routers was the wrong choice...baught a plunge router instead of stationary type...got the correct router, works awesome...👍👍
customer_reviews.author: kenneth young

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint
customer_reviews.text: My only problem with table is the plate that holds router in the holes would not match my Craftsman Router .So hand to drill hole to make work. Other than that table works like advertised .
customer_reviews.author: Mr Goo

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Good quality. Works great with my Dewalt router. I've used it quite a bit and no problems - it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor router comp.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly i have to modyfie and put in an different mounting bracket due to that i cant finde any routers that fits i Europe. So my only to options is eather to scrap the tabke and salvige som parts, or modyfie the table so i can use it... Otherwise it seem like an good table.
customer_reviews.author: Hans-Petter Hjelle

customer_reviews.title: great table
customer_reviews.text: Great table , love everything about it, one step quick change router plate while router is attached, adjustment for fence and the power switch with outlet for vacuum is sweet. I have several fingers missing on left hand and it is a design plus for me to be able to pull router with removing from plate to change bits. goes back just as easy ,, Great
customer_reviews.author: GameGirl4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Having way too much trouble trying to get the Bosch router to fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: The manual said that the router table would work with the Bosch 1617EV router, so we purchased both, only to discover this is not true. Very disappointed. Need to contact Skill/ Bosch to see how to get these to fit... Drill a hole in the plate for a third screw for mounting? Anybody got an idea?
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: This Skil router table does the job. It isn't the most stable, but once attached to our rolling work bench it did just fine. Easily adjusted, and allows easy movement of material.
customer_reviews.author: Cherished

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this thing is nice, very happy. my router bolted right up. easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Nice table.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old Craftsman table with this one. What a difference. Once I got it set up and tried it out I thought why did I put up with my old one. The feather boards are good but not great. Setting up for routing is rather easy. Recommended by a friend and I would do the same.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dilling

customer_reviews.title: I like it with my dewalt 611 and stores under bench.
customer_reviews.text: This is cool for the weekend jobs. I made my own aluminum plate and mounted my 611 dewalt router to it. When done, it all folds up to something like 10 inches and it gets stored under the bench, great.
customer_reviews.author: Rmac

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, good price
customer_reviews.text: I tried one made by Bosch before purchasing this one. Figured Bosch would be the bomb....not. Poorly built and had to return it. Got this one and was pleasantly surprised. Built well without paying the big money. No issues as of yet. I have used it about 10 times to date.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clary

customer_reviews.title: Is not universal for routers
customer_reviews.text: This router says it is universal but is not. It did not work with my router. You don’t know what routers it will work with until it is unboxed and you start reading the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine for the small trim i needed Trimmed
customer_reviews.text: Had to do bit of Tweeking But my Router fits.. Works just fine for the small trim i needed Trimmed....
customer_reviews.author: Galacliva

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble (mostly done for you) and use!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: a good value
customer_reviews.text: just the right size for my needs; easy to move and to clamp down; satisfied with the quality for the price paid
customer_reviews.author: Hector L Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great router table for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good table to go with my Skil router. Well made and designed I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It could be a little more stable as ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It could be a little more stable as other reviews have stated but for the price it as good or better than other on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SKIL RAS900 SKIL Router Table
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe the quality of this piece for the price I paid for it. The whole construction is above what I expected it to be after ordering it. I could not be more satisfied !
customer_reviews.author: Willard Washington

customer_reviews.title: Good durable for light to medium routering work!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the foldup ability. I'm not the best for keeping neat, but being able to store in a small area sure helps. Works great for the weekend hobbiest. Have already saved myself a lot of setup work. Like to do the job, not setup....take down....setup....etc.
customer_reviews.author: K7eiko

customer_reviews.title: This is a decent router table
customer_reviews.text: Sure, I'm not a professional wood-worker by any stretch of the imagination... but I hooked my SKIL router up to this thing and went to town on a few small projects that I had to do. I don't need surgical precision, but I do need it to be accurate. This table provides that functionality. I still measure accurately and make things are tight before cutting, and all goes well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance
customer_reviews.text: The table did the job I bought it for. My only temporary hangup was when I was putting the table together I didn't realize all the small parts were in the table legs. I almost went to the hardware store to buy the attaching bolts for the router hook-up. Once I found the parts it was fairly easy to set up the table.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Meincke

customer_reviews.title: Skil router table.
customer_reviews.text: Router table is easy to setup (I mounted it on 1/2" particle board). Router clap on system to table is convenient. Illustrations on table top are very helpful to align the fence. Adjustments for bit height is easy to see (front or back). Good package for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LarryTony

customer_reviews.title: Great table, I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great table, I love it. Has been so helpful in many projects and has allowed me to work on several projects I wold not have attempted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for projects
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this if I needed it on a daily basis, but for building a large bar it worked out great. The top is only laminated wood, but it works just fine for my needs. The rulers for the fence aren't the best, so I recommend using a piece a scrap after each adjustment to make sure its where you want it. The plastic angle guides aren't the best either. It definitely met my needs though.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Farwell

customer_reviews.title: router table
customer_reviews.text: i bought this router table for my brother n law as a gift after he help me get a nice truck and he loves this table i helped him in the shop the day he got it in the mail and i have to say if your looking for a good router table get this one its a nice table and it gets the job done right
customer_reviews.author: tex

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I read previous reviews on this and that's what convinced me to buy one. Now that I have it it's great easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Owens

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: A great router table but does fit all Skil routers - to my surprise. Had to buy another router. I suggest requesting/reading the router brands it accommodates before buying. Also, for above table router height adjustment mechanisms, there may not be an associated hole. Shipping was timely.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect, exactly what I expected, my Skil router fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Camron Davis

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband seems to really like his router table. It makes his word so much easier. woodworking is his hobby
customer_reviews.author: Della Cramton

customer_reviews.title: Skil RAS900
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I just got it and everything looks good so far. I was really impressed with the delivery, it took 5 days to be delivered and guess what I live outside of the US (Caribbean island). I also ordered the SKIL 1830 120-Volt 2-1/4 HP Combo Base Router Set which is yet to arrive. From the other reviews I read everyone said that the both are compatible so I'm not that worried. I was also impressed with the durability of the table as it was very well built and sturdy. I will add to this review once I actually put it to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for DIY Homeowner
customer_reviews.text: Used to make shelves for a bathroom remodel. The mounting bracket fit my router perfectly and the on/off switch in front is incredibly convenient. The table and accessories are sturdy and work very well for smaller projects, though very large pieces may be a bit unwieldy. The storage areas in the sides/legs are a great idea, but if they are not packed correctly the covers do not close and they fill with sawdust. Overall, a great product recommended for homeowner DIYers like me.
customer_reviews.author: C. Comer

customer_reviews.title: everything I need -great price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: could spend hundreds more but this is all i need to do what I want a router table to help me with. very fast router lock that allows the router to be remover to fit a new bit. do not know why anybody would need a miter gauge on a router table but most have them.

customer_reviews.title: neither of my routers would fit the mounting plate so I bought a new SKIL 1830 a very nice unit. it fits the table like it is ..
customer_reviews.text: Bought this table for a project..neither of my routers would fit the mounting plate so I bought a new SKIL 1830 a very nice unit. it fits the table like it is supposed to NOTE: Do Not USE PLUNGE it will not mount to table with it attached. I haven't had a chance to use it yet. Still waiting for my new bits to arrive.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, little shakie do to the plastic legs, but a good buy for the novice. Would buy it again though

customer_reviews.text: Fun little guy for small projects. Wouldn't take it out on a construction site, but for the few times a year I use it, it has functioned quite well. The rail holds tight and the unit is portable enough to put pretty much anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: TruthInFact

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: OK it works well, only issue I have is that the top does not life up to make mounting the router easy

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says it is and it does what it says it does. Have to spend $100's more to beat it.

customer_reviews.title: SKIL RAS900 SKIL Router Table
customer_reviews.text: Great price and item as described !!!!!!!!! Easy to put together and use, Excellent product !!!!

customer_reviews.title: Skil RAS900
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. I recommend Beautifully presented and works perfectly. I expected when I thought about buying this product. Good

customer_reviews.text: There is a slight rise in the table at the center. The weight of the router left attached over time may bring it down. Other than that it works well for what it is intended.

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece for the price. I'm sure there are more precise tables out there but not in this price range.

customer_reviews.title: Package was perfect so not a shipping issue
customer_reviews.text: OKAY product. Does the job but not particularly robust. Mine actually arrived damaged but still usable.Not worth the effort to return. Package was perfect so not a shipping issue. Expect damaged in manufacture and packed up and shipped anyway, which is not unusual for a Chinese made product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: It's not a Kreg but it also doesn't cost $400. Enough said.

customer_reviews.title: Very stable excellent table.
customer_reviews.text: Went up like a breeze. Very easy and stable to use. Reading the instructions carefully will avoid confusion when mounting your router to the quick release.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy02891

customer_reviews.title: No Manual
customer_reviews.text: This unit has no manual. On skill's website, it is the only product with a manual that is not downloadable. I used their voicemail to order on by phone but, after 8 weeks I have not seen one. It has parts I do not know how to use. The legs are wobbly and the mystery parts don't fit well in the storage. The table has only one guide track and for a finger joint jig, I would prefer two. The cord is only one foot long so I have to find an extension cord every time I use it even though there is power on my bench. If you are shopping for a router table, keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Bird doggie

customer_reviews.title: Great portable table
customer_reviews.text: Love the table and the fact that it folds down for storage. Great storage bins, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient, but not 4-5 star by any means
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this product was rated so high when I purchased. It's not bad, but there's nothing special with it. Pros: Economical price, easy to remove and reinstall the router, easy to move around, and the fence seems to hold steady despite the plastic toggle screws. Cons: the biggest con by far is the fact that the rings around the bit opening are pretty far from flush with the table top so parts hang up when they pass over them. After that, it's the cheap plastic parts and poor lid design on the side compartments That drag this down.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This router table is a nice addition to my woodshop. It will accommodate a large number of routers, not just Skil routers. It has dual outlets for your router and shop vac, so you can turn them both on with one switch. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Machine Shop 66

customer_reviews.title: good table for home projects
customer_reviews.text: This works great for the hobbiest... good for home projects
customer_reviews.author: skulltattoos

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged, the box had obvious damage and someone ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged, the box had obvious damage and someone taped over it. Sending it back was not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Rick D

customer_reviews.title: kind of flimsy, afraid it won't hold up.
customer_reviews.text: brand new out of the box the plastic flexes under even modest weight and the plastic is what reinforces the table. I'm afraid that in not too long the table top will sag and the plastic will not prevent that and the sag will make it kind of worthless, I considered making a minor modification to reinforce it, cause I really don't mind cheap plastic, but if I am going to spend time making this into a good table I'd be better off just making a new one from scratch. What is frustrating is that just some minor adjustments to design would have made this a cheap but sturdy machine, instead of a cheap but flimsy machine. I'm returning mine
customer_reviews.author: William Rotecki

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I needed to do some decent work but didn't want to sink the money that most router tables require. For the average hobbyist or DIYer, this is more than adequate. I use it primamrily to replicate mouldings and baseboards for old house restoration. It is lightweight & easy to transport. It pairs perfectly with my skill router, which is anouther great tool. I have for many years been using a Sears router table that could only accept a 1/4" router. This was fine in its day, but the router finally gave up the ghost and it was tim for an upgrade.The router itself is easy to change out when needed. Bottom line, I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this table is impressive and I use that has spent much
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Villalba

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could review this.
customer_reviews.text: I would love to review this product but it was stolen from our front yard before we could get it. We live in a secluded place and have things stolen frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy K. Wise

product_meta.title: Skil RAS900 Router Table
product_meta.description: The RAS900 come pre-assembled with an integrated accessory storage bag and a laminated MDF top. The self-contained structure provides storage for necessary parts like the fence and router bits. Included with the RAS900 is a guard, feather-board, miter gauge and bit inserts; along with a tall fence with adjustable laminated MDF faces; dual feather-boards, a starter pin and guard for support when routing curved work-pieces; a bit height gauge for easier bit setup and cutting precision, and additional accessory storage compartments. The RAS900 has a quick-release router mount that attaches and detaches in seconds. An efficient folding design means the table comes pre-assembled with minimal setup needed and legs fold for storage. Stability plus convenience makes this a great router table for any DIYer.
feature_bullets: Accessory storage containers protect and store accessories with router table
RAS900 comes with 2 containers and includes quick clamp system
Two feather-boards help guide work-piece for more accurate routing
